website_summaries.verdict: The OnePlus 7T for T-Mobile has terrific performance for its price, but it occupies an uncomfortable place in the company's phone lineup.
pros: Good price for fast, smooth performance
cons: Less storage and shorter battery life than the OnePlus 7 Pro

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the best part of £600 worth of phone, got a few quids worth of male grooming products. Arranged return, collected 27/12/19. No acknowledgement as of 29/12/19.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top end phone for much less than an ewuivay Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: I considered buying the OnePlus 8, but after comparing specs, decided the 7T was the one for me. Absolutely loving the 90hz display and lovely smooth stutter free performance. I was worried that a phone with a 6.55 inch display would be uncomfortable to hold, but the aspect ratio makes the phone narrow enough to make it comfortable to hold. The build quality is also top notch and as good as the previy Samsung device I owned. So happy I went with the 7T. There is nothing else to match the performance at this price.
customer_reviews.author: RTR

customer_reviews.title: Better than pixel.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few phones recently and they have lacked certain elements. This seems to have them all! Great screen Fast fingerprint unlock Good battery Fast charge Good speakers Ive had pixels, iphones and Samsung's and this seems to bring all the features and build quality into one package. Really impressed so far . Pixels were plagued with hardware issues and Samsung's fingerprint unlock was dreadful. Only negative for me is the notch which isn't very attractive but you can black it out in the settings but it's not too bad. Don't hesitate at this offer price , you won't find a better phone in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Luke Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my missus, who adores it - we've had the OP2, 3,6 and now this, and each of the old ones has lasted phenomenally well - this was to replace my old OP3 that she had been using when the insurance couldn't replace a broken screen - it was still running almost like new despite years of software updates, but the 7 is so slick in comparison that she is over the moon.
customer_reviews.author: Hamish Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Great value, iPhone substitute
customer_reviews.text: What great value for the money. Having been an iPhone user since 2008 the change was easy, the difference is so little in fact the OnePlus is better on many fronts. Sure the camera's are not as good but it will be hard to tell on a day to day usage. Most popular apps used on iphone are Google related so the change is easy going to android.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great battery and fast charging with warp charge 3
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dual SIM phone, comes with screen protector applied. The camera is raised on the back so I recommend a decent case with access to the notification switch and raised edges around the rear camera and front screen. Pictures aren't as good as Google pixel 2, but close. Initial problems with some apps now seem to be resolved. Warp charge is fantastic, recommend getting the car adapter.
customer_reviews.author: kindlefan

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Mine was faulty and nobody wanted to help me, not very impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: My second OnePlus phone! Amazing device.
customer_reviews.text: I have switched from OnePlus 5T which was 2 years and 6 months old and what I can say... This phone is truly amazing. Don't listen to negative comments... I have purchased S10, but returned it because battery life on it was so bad. 7T is very quick, battery life is great and hopefully will last at least two years before my next upgrade ;) If you're due an upgrade, go for 7T!
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Best phone.
customer_reviews.text: I paid £550 last year for this. And it's the best £550 I've ever spent. The fast charging is too quick. It's rediculous. 30 mins of charge will probably last the whole day, and in another 20 mins it will be 100%. Very snappy, fast. Faster than some 2nd hand iPhones which are still more expensive. Very few bugs which are always being ironed out. I can't fault this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: OnePlus is A+
customer_reviews.text: Changed from a Google Pixel 3xl to this and I am in love! Lightning quick, Oxygen software sublime (very little alteration from pure Android), great battery and no humongous notch to boot! I am so glad I made the change. Screen is simply sublime and good speakers despite facing downwards. If you are on the fence take the leap you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy3utt

customer_reviews.title: Very cost effective package all round, shame about my specific circumstance.
customer_reviews.text: For the money the Op7t is very cost effective and I would probably buy again, however, after a few months of use my handset has stopped, 'holding calls', over cellular and has made me call over WhatsApp or messenger for a reliable connection. After having a look, this is an issue that has cropped up with historical OnePlus devices and is on their forums.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Luke Peter Rodmell

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost cell phone with high performance.
customer_reviews.text: The camera always make great shots, the battery life is enough for the whole day, the fast charging is really powerful and you can also play all the games you want, without fps drops and crashes.
customer_reviews.author: J.V.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal battery life great processor and so very comfortable in the hand. would definitely recommend this phone to people
customer_reviews.author: David M. Beardsworth

customer_reviews.title: Was Samsung then Huawei now OnePlus..... all decent phones just this is cheaper...
customer_reviews.text: Decent phone ... cheaper than the rest.... can lose the WiFi signal... but doesn't impact so just an red herring alert probably.
customer_reviews.author: kronyboy

customer_reviews.title: Strong performance on a fabulous screen
customer_reviews.text: OnePlus has made strides in what has traditionally been regarded by some as its achilles heel: the 7T sports very competent front & rear cameras. You will appreciate the 7T performance on the magnificent screen, as well as the extremely fast charging times.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Yet another amazing OnePlus phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my second OnePlus phone (first was OnePlus 5T). Speed is incredible, there are no lags. 90Hz screen is amazing. Camera is greatly improved compared to my 5T, I find the picture quality very good especially pictures taken in low light conditions. Battery is OK, gets me through the day with average usage and if it's running low, a quick charge with the fast charger gives enough boost.
customer_reviews.author: Val Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life and very responsive
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this phone to write the review! The phone is a great price of kit! You won't be disappointed at all! Battery last several days with moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, arrived in 1 day
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Happy with the purchase. The phone seems to work great, I charge it every 24 hours so battery lasts long ( hopefully it will be always like this), pictures are simply incredible and it's also incredibly fast. I highly recommend this product. I received my item after only 24 hours from the payment, super happy for this.
customer_reviews.author: Stefania

customer_reviews.title: Quality Phone
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant phone at a decent price, has all the apps and systems that you could want and use.Battery life is really good and the warp charge option is great when your in a hurry and you need a quick charge.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Battery life rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Haveong am oneplus 5 for 2 year , the r ason for 3 star is the battery life if rubbish, OnePlus 5 would last almost a full day, this need least 2 charge a day,
customer_reviews.author: jawad a.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic device and delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing all around. Came exactly how OnePlus delivered my brother's 7T, except I got mine from Amazon. Comes with charger, phone, phone case and a steel pin to open the SIM slots, exactly like it does when you order from oneplus. 100% recommend, this is the best phone I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: JoshJames

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, totally recommend it. So fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: A cracker of a phone
customer_reviews.text: A great phone, some brilliant functions. Camera is fantastic. Slight downside is the awkwardness when making calls with the location of the speaker (especially when you wear glasses!) Apart from that, you get a lot for your money!
customer_reviews.author: John Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended phone
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone on a recommendation from my sister and it was the best advice she gave me for a good phone
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Agha

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend and so far the phone has been functioning well.. I'm so happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Chuks Nancy

customer_reviews.title: The Best Phone until now - Value for money!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the purchase! The phone works amazing! Stylish design and charge time is insane!
customer_reviews.author: danishdreamz

customer_reviews.title: ONE PLUS 7T
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with ease of setting up and very charging facility. Features are good and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: David Jolly

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time oneplusing
customer_reviews.text: I had a OnePlus 5 n love it,. Lost it, and change couldn't justify a one plus 8s price.... I love my 7t, it's big responsive looks great, the screen is smooth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A brilliant phone!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to buy a new phone and lots of reviews were pointing to the Oneplus 7T, and they are definitely not wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: solid fast phone
customer_reviews.text: ive had oneplus phones for the last 3 years and this doesn't disappoint. all good up to now.
customer_reviews.author: C T.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: It looks so nice and it is so professional and good quality.Thaaanks, my boyfriend loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ema

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Phone
customer_reviews.text: Fastest phone I've ever had , Smooth operating system .
customer_reviews.author: Bry

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: The face recognition doesn't recognise me with glasses and fingerprint reader you have to put your finger on comfortably for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Lam

customer_reviews.title: Great tech great value
customer_reviews.text: Fab phone despite always having an iPhone I can't tell the difference except in price
customer_reviews.author: M. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: OnePlus repair service is terrible
customer_reviews.text: If you have an issue with your phone they have a terrible repair service centre.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely satisfied with the phone. The charging time is insanely good.
customer_reviews.author: André Chicrala

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: The phone is pretty flawless for the price, I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: George Evans

customer_reviews.title: Phone quality was excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Phone quality was excellent. Was one of the best buy ..
customer_reviews.author: Anish

customer_reviews.title: Apple Who ?
customer_reviews.text: Gone from Apple to OnePlus and I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of £549
customer_reviews.text: The phone looked ok straight out the box, once id changed everything over from my old 1+6t, I tried to go on a couple of apps and noticed it was lagging like mad, and the screen would even completely shut down and force to force restart it. I gave it a couple of days and still the same issue. I even uninstalled and reinstalled the apps I spotted it caused the issue most with. I don't know what is wrong with it, I can only speculate that it's either the screen is faulty or dodgy software, but for an upgrade its caused nothing but issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I normally go for really expensive phones, wanting to save a little money this was perfect for me! Has all I need. Fingerprint works well, some good features, plus love the battery and charge time! Highly recommend it, box even comes with a phone case However slightly disappointed at the screen which was damaged upon arrival, but can't be helped sometimes
customer_reviews.author: ChloeScarXO

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive phone !
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made phone... Great screen & frosted silver colour is great too....very fast & very easy to use....transfer of data from my old phone was straightforward too...pre applied Screen protector & clear case in the box too !! Fast charger included...a bit slippery in the hand so make sure to invest in a case ! The ibetter case in black is great value for this phone... delivery was quick & I'm very impressed overall with the phone so far...glad I gave the plusone brand a try...as good as the bigger name branded phones on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M.

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade, lovely screen
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from OnePlus 3T, worth the money. A great phone, not too big. Lovely screen & fast. Battery life pretty good, fast charge excellent. Doesn't get warm. This will last me a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Louise Mimnagh

customer_reviews.title: failed to boot up after a few days
customer_reviews.text: Very quick phone for the few days that it lasted. It failed boot up after a few days. Now I have a further problem as the return label will not scan.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic top notch performance
customer_reviews.text: An absolute beast for half the price of an iPhone. Good quality and premium feel with the latest technology and Android Q.
customer_reviews.author: Waimea

customer_reviews.title: Fast warp charge
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, especially that warp charge & 90 Hz screen. Feels like a significant step rather than the usual small increments
customer_reviews.author: Sral Lharp

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect device!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mobile, can't fault it other than the battery slacking a little.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

16,6 cm / 6.55” AMOLED Screen – for an impressive multimedia experience, instant touch-response, more speed and a fascinating clarity
Ultra Clear Triple Camera - 48MP main camera, 2x zoom, 16MP wide angle and 16MP front camera, nightscape 2.0, personal photo studio
8 GB RAM and 128 GB internal storage for more performance, true speed and larger amounts of data/ High-performance processor Qualcomm Snapdragon 855+
Power Battery 3800 mAh – Next generation WARP CHARGE 30 technology (ready-to-go in 20 minutes) fast charging / Android Q operating system
